title: Finally!!
text: Finally an official native app. I‚Äôve been using it all day and so far the app it really well developed. Haven‚Äôt seen any bugs yet. UI is nice, clean and simple. Gives it an elegant minimal feel. I love the haptic feedback of the Ô£øTaptic Engine that they incorporated. That was nice touch. This is a really good release for a 1.0 version. Love the web app, I‚Äôm love this native app just a little bit more, though. üòÖ. Thank you, OpenAI.

title: Amazing! 10/10
text:
This thing was a lifesaver for my quick assignments. 
Besides my cheating, this chatbot actually gives you important information, was very fast, and can answer almost any questions you have. 
Id argue its better than using google because of all the detail and precision. I would only suggest pictures to be added.

Google could never lol.

title: Great, but not perfect
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for several months, and it‚Äôs worked well. However, I have very lately been experiencing Somme accessibility issues. The app no longer works well  with my screen reader. now, when I tap anywhere on the screen, I just hear close menu, and an unable to hear any of the text. I would really appreciate if this could be addressed. thank you.

title: Why update to not work?
text: I swear bug fixes and small improvements always mean privacy breaches and a less functioning product that still only knowledgeable up to September 2021. Since the last few updates I have uninstalled and reinstalled because I cannot send my messages to the AI. It works on random and seems not even worth using anymore. When I first downloaded the app several months ago before all the constant updates I very much enjoyed the banter with AI but since then its been dumbed down. Pity

title: Password reset doesn‚Äôt exist for anyone
text: Such a useful tool but good luck if you ever need to reset your password. You‚Äôll never receive an email no matter how many times you try. Google it - there are tons of users (including me) who‚Äôve had this problem and OpenAI has never fixed it. Your only option if you signed up without a password and have issues signing in later, or if you forget your password, is to create a whole new account. Such a basic account security feature is completely absent and apparently OpenAI doesn‚Äôt care enough to fix it.

title: Love it
text: Man you don‚Äôt know how many work emails I answer with chat. I call it my reverse anger translator. Need to tell your boss to take a long walk off a short cliff? Chats got your back and will say it in a way that doesn‚Äôt get you fired haha! Real talk though. I work as a swim lesson manager and most of my emails are repetitious non-sense to parents. Chat writes lovely newsletters and keeps track of all my responses love it!

title: Versatile, convenient, organized
text: ChatGPT 3.5, the current free version, delivers information in a concise and generally well-written style. As with any assistant, artificial or human, it may be misinformed on occasion. I don‚Äôt notice that weak source material diminishes its confidence in any way, but it will check its own answers if you cross-examine them. A highly valuable time-saver for research and a very acceptable organizer for textual information.

title: Educational opportunities
text:
Ready access to information of different sources can help a person decide on numerous questions. As has often been said about history: victors write the history of wars, etc. The American Civil War has voluminous writings of both sides so you can ‚Äúsee‚Äù the big picture more clearly.

I digress‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. educational opportunities to learn from multiple sources.

title: Would love to see plug-in and browsing support be supported properly.
text: This app is great. Faster than the website, and nicer to look at aesthetically. Would love to see plug-in support and/or proper browsing support. The reason I say proper is because if you start a browsing chat on the web and then go to it on the app, it will still work. I would love to see it properly introduced into the app.

title: The best app for those in school
text: This app has helped me with my homework, especially when I had a huge load it made it easier for me to complete my task on a timely manner, helping me with essays math, science, and every other class in between a great feature to add, would the ability to import photos for help on certain topics or wonderment questions

title: It lies
text:
I‚Äôll ask it a question.  
‚ÄúWhat is woodworthia?‚Äù
Its response ‚Äòan extinct species of lizard‚Äô
I happen to know that is incorrect so I try to correct it and it refuses my correction. 
I close the app and then reopen and ask again
‚ÄúWhat is woodworthia?‚Äù
It responds ‚Äò woodworthia is an extinct species of tree fern‚Äô 
This is the correct answer. So I tell it you said it was a lizard. And then it denies that woodworthia is a lizard. I copy text from previous conversations and say see this is what you said. And it responds in a way as if to say I‚Äôm mistaken.  
Anyway it‚Äôs just a chatbot. But it has done this a few too many times. It is false information so until it becomes a better source of accurate information I‚Äôm not going to use it. 
But I love the concept and hope that I can one day not need to do an internet search but instead just ask a chatbot for information.

title: DOWNLOAD ASAP.
text: when I tell you how much this app has helped me get through life and school and work situations I mean it. even things like poems it can write and they sound so so so professional and thought through and yet all it took was me typing out a prompt. anyways i‚Äôm really tired rn but I could go on and on and on about how good this app is but it already knows üòù

title: Vertical scroll is horribly broken
text: I absolutely love this app, and I pay for the pro version. But ChatGPT can be very verbose and give you very long answers. The arrow down button works fine, but in order to scroll up and down on a long answer, the touch controls are very finicky, and it‚Äôs hard to register a vertical swipe instead of a horizontal one.

title: Fabulous

title: Scrolling issues persist
text: Problematic scrolling issue when history is turned off which has gone unaddressed for several updates now. As others have also pointed out, scrolling even one pixel to the left will open the sidebar and clear the chat. This is a major time waster. I hope that OpenAI realizes that over time this will just lead to more expense (higher conversation volume due to restarting chats) and lost revenue (cancelled subscriptions) given users that can‚Äôt properly use the app. Thank you.

title: Fast! Lacking Plugins and browsing
text:
Pros:
It's late in the party but nevertheless a good app. The audio input features picks up languages that even Apple iPhone's talk to text mic cannot. It's quick and accurate.

Cons:
One limitation is not being able to browse the internet and has no plugins despite the fact that I am a plus user. A feature with possibly assistant (Siri or Alexa)-like interaction should be introduced where it speaks the responses for us.

title: ChatGPT
text:
I am truly amazed by most of the responses. 
This is my observation.
I can see that ChatGPT has what I call data bias.  So for example if there was a heated debate ChatGPT would lean in one direction rather that opposing view. 
Some responses have me concerned because at the end of the day due to the biases of the people entering the data may not be 100% factual or some important data may be suppressed.

title: Just what you need, if you understand why!
text: I have had the pleasure of utilizing the services of ChatGPT, and I must say that it is nothing short of incredible. First and foremost, ChatGPT‚Äôs natural language processing abilities are truly remarkable. It comprehends and responds to text inputs with astounding accuracy, making it an invaluable resource for tasks such as research, writing, and communication. Keywords: adaptability, relevant, groundbreaking.

title: No guidance on new features for Plus
text: I‚Äôve been a Plus subscriber for months and the new voice feature was something I was looking forward to as a tool accommodation for dyslexia. It is passed the date stated the the new feature would be available to all plus users and no word or  feedback about the lack of features. Or even an adjusted timeline. What makes my $20 a month less valuable than another‚Äôs? Can‚Äôt wait for more competition to catch up to these poor businesses practices.

title: Very helpful app for many different problems
text: This app is like a god send or your own personal genie I have asked questions whether it‚Äôs about animals, cars, food and even makes post for social media for you. A recommendation is to give ChatGPT ears so it can hear and recognize weird noises that could either help troubleshoot mechanical things or even analyze emotion.

title: Okay, but‚Ä¶
text: Chat GPT is a good toy which illustrates the very basic abilities of AI. Since the app does not have the ability to upgrade itself, it is locked into 2021 and earlier data. In this age of fast moving technology and information retrieval that‚Äôs too bad. It doesn‚Äôt even have the ability to access the internet. It becomes boring extremely rapidly.

title: Excellent resource for human kind
text:
I won't need to say much, CHATGPT is a powerful resource to get on demand information rapidly. Sometimes the answers may be broad but most often it tells me what I need to know. 

I wish the creators continue to make this free, because this is bigger than money. The creators in large are playing a part in humanity's development and future.
